headline.main: Liberty and Security in the Age of Terror

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Bush Sets Option of Military Trials in Terrorist Cases'' (front page, Nov. 14): The White House is correct to recognize that ''the conventional way of bringing people to justice doesn't apply to these times.''
abstract: Stephen M Flatow letter backs Pres Bush's considering option of military trials in terrorist cases, holding White House is correct to recognize that 'conventional way' of bringing people to justice doesn't apply to these times; notes his daugther Alisa was 20 years old and a student in Israel when she was killed by suicide bomber of Islamic Jihad in 1995; contends those who perpetrate attacks against civilians should be dealt with as war criminals
